title: BlakeActkinson
text: Hey, my name is Blake. Welcome to my personal site. I’m interested in the intersection between statistics and environmental science. Feel free to click around and explore.

title: About Me
text:
Publications

Peer-Reviewed Journal Articles

Actkinson, B. and Griffin, R. J. (2023). Detecting plumes in mobile air quality monitoring time series with density-based spatial clustering of applications with noise. Atmospheric Measurement Techniques, 16, 3547–3559.

LINK

Actkinson, B., Ensor, K., & Griffin, R. J. (2021). SIBaR: a new method for background quantification and removal from mobile air pollution measurements. Atmospheric Measurement Techniques, 14(8), 5809-5821.

LINK

Miller, D. J., Actkinson, B., Padilla, L., Griffin, R. J., Moore, K., Lewis, P. G. T., … & Alvarez, R. A. (2020). Characterizing elevated urban air pollutant spatial patterns with mobile monitoring in Houston, Texas. Environmental Science & Technology, 54(4), 2133-2142.
